product_name: Eagle Creek ORV 30 Trunk Wheeled Duffel - 30"
long_description: The Eagle Creek ORV 30 Trunk, a high-capacity wheeled duffel with thoughtful organization details, is designed for long trips, large families or week-long multisport adventures. Oversize front panel opening provides easy packing and unpacking; features 2 internal zip mesh stash pockets and a detachable internal compression cargo net. Cargo net can also be attached to the outside of the bag to transport additional equipment externally. External-access wet/dry boot compartment is seam taped and separates damp and dirty gear from the clean; compartment zips down to a small stash pocket when not needed. Stowable Equipment Keeper strap allows you to stow additional gear on the top outside of the bag; gear attaches with an elastic porter hook that hides away when not in use. Lockable, quick-stash top pocket with interior zip mesh pocket. Bi-Tech(TM) nylon and Bi-Tech(TM) Armor fabrics in high-wear zones provide extreme abrasion- and weather-resistance. Rugged wheels have sturdy wheel housings; skid plate, rear runners and side bumpers add protection against curbs and rough usage. Handle extends smoothly and offers a comfortable grip; cleanly zips away when not deployed. Top, front and side grab handles; multiple lash points secure gear and allow lashing to your vehicle. Storm flaps help protect self-repairing main zipper and have finger-friendly pulls. Central locking point secures main entry point with a single lock (luggage locks sold separately). Reflective accents on the Eagle Creek ORV 30 Trunk offer dusk and nighttime visibility.
short_description: The Eagle Creek ORV 30 Trunk, a high-capacity wheeled duffel with thoughtful organization details, is designed for long trips, large families or week-long multisport adventures.
